1.0.5.name: wordpress/xwolf-protest-page
1.0.5.description:
Displays a black day with a notice. As default it shows a (german) protest notice by the Pirate Party Germany about the world day against cyber-censorship 2013 (as invoked by Reporter Without Borders, http://en.rsf.org/). It wont forbit the access to the website. Users can close it and continue reading.

A cookie will be set for users after they saw the notice the first time. This will prevent them to get spamed by the notice every time they come back at the same day.

Within the backend options this plugin can be used for other protest days also.

Notice: The protest page wont be displayed on screens below a solution of 600 pixel.
